snippet: In “Reveal,” Silas Riener, Rashaun Mitchell and Cori Kresge performed on the grass of the Elevated Acre in Lower Manhattan. This site-specific dance exposed them to the elements.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews site specific dance Reveal performed by Silas Riener, Cori Kresge and Rashaun Mitchell at the Elevated Acre in Lower Manhattan.
lead_paragraph: In “Reveal,” Silas Riener, Rashaun Mitchell and Cori Kresge performed on the grass of the Elevated Acre in Lower Manhattan. This site-specific dance exposed them to the elements.

headline.seo: Silas Riener Presents ‘Reveal’ at the Elevated Acre
headline.main: Nature Makes a Cameo at a Site-Specific Show
headline.print_headline: Nature Makes a Cameo At a Site-Specific Show
